questions.content: At the end of each group tour, participants will receive a souvenir photo that is _______ to keep.

Members of the marketing team are contributing articles to online news outlets to attract _______for our brand.

When salespeople exceed their quarterly sales goals, the company rewards them_______in the form of bonuses.
If the package had been lost in transit, the shipping company_______ to compensate for the loss.

Unfortunately, the_______ wording of the contract led to there being multiple interpretations of its meaning.

Alarax Graphics can print all types of signs, in_______ shape and size may be required.
